message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell at $14000. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $13000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, I'm still a bit too high at $13000. How about we meet in the middle at $13500? I'm confident this will be a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. Given my budget, I would like to propose a price of $13200 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
